rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0001
rows.name: Hragh, hroar, hrraah!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0002
rows.name:
Jikarao?
What big voice about?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0003
rows.name:
Seem to be getting very worked up
for something! What Jikarao planning?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0004
rows.name: I want to talk more...with others.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0005
rows.name: But everyone is scared of me...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0006
rows.name:
I am not a scary person...
I want them to see that.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0007
rows.name:
Jikarao is kind Blade who doesn't
even crush ants on path!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0008
rows.name:
Yeah, it's a good idea to talk to people
if you want them to understand you.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0009
rows.name:
I'm sure people will get the message
you're a big softy if you talk a bit more.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0010
rows.name:
A solid plan. I'm sure people will
understand once they get to know you.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0011
rows.name:
Yeah, good thinking. Chat to people
a bit more, let them see the real you.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0012
rows.name:
Maybe talking hard for Jikarao, though.
Growling more normal for him.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0013
rows.name:
Yes... Everyone runs from my voice.
That is the problem.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0014
rows.name: How can I fix this?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0015
rows.name: Uhm...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0016
rows.name:
How about you help out that crying
kid?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0017
rows.name:
Well, looks like a senior citizen's in
trouble over there. You could help her?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0018
rows.name: Let's think...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0019
rows.name:
Hey, why don't you go and help that
squalling brat over there?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0020
rows.name:
That old fogey's in a spot of bother.
Why don't you go and help her?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0021
rows.name: Hmmmm...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0022
rows.name:
Why don't you help that crying child
over there?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0023
rows.name:
Why don't you assist that elderly
woman over there?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0024
rows.name: Lessee now...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0025
rows.name:
That lil' ankle-biter over there's doing
my nut in. Why don't you go help 'em?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0026
rows.name:
That old bat's struggling a bit.
Why don't you go and help her out?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0101
rows.name: Good idea!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0102
rows.name:
By helping someone, Jikarao show
everyone big soft pulpy heart!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0103
rows.name:
Hahaha! I can do that...
Jikarao to the rescue!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0104
rows.name: Tora, will you join me?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0105
rows.name: Tora's pleasure!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0106
rows.name:
Waaaaa!
Uwaaaa!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0107
rows.name:
What wrong?
Why all crying?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0108
rows.name:
*sob*
I dunno where my mum is...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0109
rows.name: You're lost?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0110
rows.name:
Wah!
A-a monster!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0111
rows.name: No! No monster!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0112
rows.name:
Maybe look like monster.
But not nasty like monster!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0113
rows.name:
Please, do not be afraid.
I will not eat you!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0114
rows.name: *sob*

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0115
rows.name:
Jikarao... Maybe you make it worse
with that talk.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0116
rows.name:
Oh. Sorry...
Tora, you look after the child.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0117
rows.name: I will look for the mother!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0118
rows.name:
Hey!
What are you doing to my child?!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0119
rows.name: Ah? This is your child?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0120
rows.name:
Help! Help!
Monster!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0121
rows.name:
Monster...?
No! No no no... I'm not...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0122
rows.name:
Someone help! This great big brute's
gonna eat my baby!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0123
rows.name: No! Ah!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0124
rows.name:
Not a monster! I'm a Blade!
A Blade!!!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0125
rows.name: Jikarao... Please calm down...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0126
rows.name:
Wargh! There's a monster in the village!
Someone come quick!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0127
rows.name:
Hrrahh...
Arrooooo!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0128
rows.name: Waaargh!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0129
rows.name: No, Jikarao!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0130
rows.name: You make all scared with big voice!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0131
rows.name: Mummy!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0132
rows.name: Janny! Get out of here!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0133
rows.name: Ah, it hopeless.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0134
rows.name:
Urgh...
Sorry... Again, I failed...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0135
rows.name:
Hey, don't beat yourself up about it.
You didn't mean it.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0136
rows.name:
Maybe you just need to let people get
to know you more slowly.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0137
rows.name:
Hey, don't take it so hard.
You messed up 'cos you were daft,
not 'cos you did anything bad.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0138
rows.name: Sometimes these things take time.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0139
rows.name:
You shouldn't react so negatively to
failure. You didn't choose to fail.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0140
rows.name:
Think of it as the first step on a long
path.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0141
rows.name:
Come on, dude. No need to be sporting
a downer mug like that. You didn't
do it on purpose.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0142
rows.name:
We just need to get everyone used to
your mad ways in their own time.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0143
rows.name: Thank you...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0144
rows.name: I will not give up.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0145
rows.name:
One day, I will make friends with
everyone!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0201
rows.name: Very good!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0202
rows.name:
Maybe if Jikarao does nice thing for
someone, people know Jikarao nice!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0203
rows.name: Tora will tag along!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0204
rows.name: Hehe. Yeah!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0205
rows.name: Ahhh...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0206
rows.name: You okay, old lady?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0207
rows.name:
Ah, I've been trying to get back 'ome.
But me knees are right done in.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0208
rows.name:
Me eyes aren't up to much either.
If I get a bit out of breath, I can't
see a blessed thing.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0209
rows.name:
Oh! Ah... Madam!
Let me help you!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0210
rows.name:
Oh, thank you so much, young man.
I'm much obliged.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0211
rows.name: Okay to walk?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0212
rows.name: Yes, I think I can manage that...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0213
rows.name:
Oh?
What's this 'ere?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0214
rows.name: Funny place to put a rock!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0215
rows.name: Ah no, that's...part of my body...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0216
rows.name:
Ooh my! What a burly gent I'm getting
walked home by! The neighbors'll be
talking!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0217
rows.name: Madam...watch your step!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0218
rows.name: What the bloody 'ell's that thing!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0219
rows.name: A bloody monster's what it is!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0220
rows.name:
Oh, sounds like there's a bit of a
commotion.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0221
rows.name:
It is nothing.
Just...some monster.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0222
rows.name:
Ooh, I don't like the sound of that.
Let's get 'ome quick!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0223
rows.name:
Do not worry, Madam.
I will protect you.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0224
rows.name:
Oh, my hero!
I don't doubt it!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0225
rows.name: This is where you live?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0226
rows.name:
Yes, this is my humble abode.
Thank you so much, young man.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0227
rows.name: Will you tell me your name?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0228
rows.name: I am...Jikarao.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0229
rows.name:
Oh, that's a funny name...
But thank you, Jikarao-san!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0230
rows.name: You are most welcome!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0231
rows.name: You did great there, Jikarao!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0232
rows.name:
A few more good deeds like that, and
everyone'll know what a nice guy you
are!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0233
rows.name: Great job, Jikarao.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0234
rows.name:
Keep that up, and you'll get a
proper good rep!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0235
rows.name:
Jikarao, taking time out to help
someone like that...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0236
rows.name:
You are a kind soul. I'm sure
everyone will see that in due time.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0237
rows.name:
Whoa, you're in there, dude.
Did you get her number?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0238
rows.name:
But seriously. That was good going,
man. More of that, and they'll make you
a saint, or something.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0239
rows.name:
Yes!
I must keep being nice.
Keep being kind.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0240
rows.name: Everyone...thank you!
